title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 9 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore Guided tour - Au Sable Light Station - 2016      Time: 11:00 AM to 11:45 AM,12:00 PM to 12:45 PM,1:00 PM to 1:45 PM,2:30 PM to 3:15 PM,3:30 PM to 4:15 PM,4:30 PM to 5:15 PM Location: Au Sable Light Station  Fees: $3     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/12/2016 to 10/15/2016 Au Sable Lighthouse tours are scheduled Wednesday through Sunday, June 12 through October 15, 2016 - 11 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. View Details      Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore Hike with a Ranger      Time: 12:00 PM Location: vary, check facebook or at a visitor center Fees: no fee     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 06/26/2016 to 09/11/2016 Join a ranger on a hike in the park. View Details      Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore Shipwrecks, Sandstone, Sunset & a Superior Lighthouse      Location: Hurricane River Campground Fees: $3 per person     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 07/06/2016 to 08/31/2016 View shipwrecks, learn the history of the area, and watch the sunset from the top of the lighthouse. Reservations required.  View Details      Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore 50 Years of Pictured Rocks NL      Time: 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM Location: Sable Falls     Friday, August 19, 2016 Every Friday Weekly  from 07/01/2016 to 09/02/2016 Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore is celebrating its 50th anniversary this year. Time: 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM Location: Lake Superior Overlook Fees: no fee     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 07/02/2016 to 09/03/2016 Drop-in program on bears and bear safety. View Details      Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore Canoe Exploration in Beaver Basin      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Little Beaver Lake Fees: free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Every Saturday Every 2 Week(s)  from 06/18/2016 to 09/10/2016 Celebrate the park's 50th and the NPS 100th  anniversaries by joining us on a canoe trip in the Beaver Basin Wilderness.
